text: Google Play, (also known as the Google Play Store, Play store, or sometimes the Android Store (and was formerly known as the Android Market)), is a platform by Google. It is a online store for music, books, movies and a few million Android applications. Google formed it in March 2012 by merging four different stores: * Android Market, the oldest, was started in October 2008 * Google Music * Google Books * Google Movies. Google Play also sold Google hardware devices, until 2015 when Google started a new Google Store for that. ==References== Play
title: Google Play
